concept.title: Time Build Guide
concept.shortdesc: How to build a Time platform service.

conbody.p: The Time platform service is a plug-in to the System State Manager.

li.p: You must be familiar with building ROM for the Symbian platform.

section.title: Reference code
section.p: A reference template is provided at os/devicesrv/sysstatemgmt/systemstateplugins/adptplugin/inc/rtcadaptationref.h. Use the reference code as a guide to implement on the hardware.
Note that the reference source code is not supported on the emulator.

section.title: Building a ROM
section.p: The system state manager plug-ins are built as a DLL.
